ygData.subject: Re: Greetings and a ?
ygData.msgSnippet: There are 2 forges in the high elf city of Felwithe that you can use, both inside the same building next to each other. One is a cultural forge - for K dals
ygData.messageBody:
There are 2 forges in the high elf city of Felwithe that you can use,
both inside the same building next to each other. One is a cultural
forge - for K 'dals' only, the only is A Forge. You probably want the
A Forge which is the one on the far wall. That is the one I had to
use when making my cleric quest armor.
Hope this helps!

Cahlia Firenymph
20th Season Wood Elf
Druid of Tunare
Morrel Thule

Laurylle
11th Season H.E. Cleric
of Tunare
Morrel Thule

things

this

quest.

started

the
> > masked spy and the Gen. Orc (with the help of a Dwarf with a Big

> > together at -2096.28, 2326.77 in Greater Faydark)and they can be
> > pulled with spells one at a time) I got their heads and turned
them
> > in to Seria and got the dull sword I'm to sharpen the sword, and
turn
> > it in with some arborean amber and a P.forest drakeling scale to
get
> > the first pally sword....well the dum sword will not sharpen, I
use 1
> > and 2 sharping stones, the sword and put them in the forge in the
> > armorer's shop and I'm told "these idems will not combine try
another
> > forge...WHAT other forge?? My first ? is..is there another forge
in

> > level?
> >
> > my 2nd ? is on the first Pally armor quest where or what in the
name

Bronze"
